response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000. I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I understand that this investment might be significant, but I am confident it will provide substantial returns and meet your needs perfectly.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I am here to assist you throughout the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
